title: Reign of Silence
description: When Joshua Nix came to pastor a church in the county seat town of St. Helena, Alabama, he could not have known his life and worldview would change forever.After the mysterious death of her parents, Meredith Dubose, last descendent of an aristocratic Southern family, experiences - what? Psychological trauma? A true "haunting" in the family mansion? A demonic siege? As Joshua seeks to minister to Meredith, he finds himself obsessing over her and her plight - causing strain on his marriage and his church. Joshua soon learns the horrific truth of the supernatural events and a shattering truth about himself.A frightening story told with an evocative Southern gothic flavor, Reign of Silence is ultimately a tale of redemption in the face of otherworldly terror.
author: Tony  Martin
